headline: KLA Corporation, Marvell Technology, Micron, Nova, and FormFactor Shares Are Falling, What You Need To Know
summary: A number of stocks fell in the morning session after a cautious outlook from semiconductor equipment giant ASML sparked a broad sell-off across the sector, hitting chipmakers and equipment suppliers alike.

raw.headline: KLA Corporation, Marvell Technology, Micron, Nova, and FormFactor Shares Are Falling, What You Need To Know
raw.summary: A number of stocks fell in the morning session after a cautious outlook from semiconductor equipment giant ASML sparked a broad sell-off across the sector, hitting chipmakers and equipment suppliers alike.

headline: Why Lam Research (LRCX) Shares Are Trading Lower Today
summary: Shares of semiconductor equipment maker Lam Research (NASDAQ:LRCX) fell 3.2% in the morning session after fellow semiconductor equipment giant ASML Holding (ASML) warned it could no longer confirm growth in 2026.

raw.headline: Why Lam Research (LRCX) Shares Are Trading Lower Today
raw.summary: Shares of semiconductor equipment maker Lam Research (NASDAQ:LRCX) fell 3.2% in the morning session after fellow semiconductor equipment giant ASML Holding (ASML) warned it could no longer confirm growth in 2026.

headline: Why Applied Materials (AMAT) Stock Is Down Today
summary: Shares of semiconductor machinery manufacturer Applied Materials (NASDAQ:AMAT) fell 3.8% in the morning session after a warning from European peer ASML (ASML) about potential growth uncertainty in 2026 due to U.S. tariff policies.

raw.headline: Why Applied Materials (AMAT) Stock Is Down Today
raw.summary: Shares of semiconductor machinery manufacturer Applied Materials (NASDAQ:AMAT) fell 3.8% in the morning session after a warning from European peer ASML (ASML) about potential growth uncertainty in 2026 due to U.S. tariff policies.

headline: Applied Materials Soars 14% in a Month: Time to Buy or Hold the Stock?
summary: AMAT jumps 14% in a month as strong chip tool demand, rising margins, and a broad product edge fuel investor interest.

headline: HPE Seeks 'Additional Value Creation' After Pact With Activist Investor Elliott
summary: Server maker Hewlett Packard Enterprise has created a committee aimed at identifying "opportunities for additional value creation," the server maker said Wednesday.

raw.headline: HPE Seeks 'Additional Value Creation' After Pact With Activist Investor Elliott
raw.summary: Server maker Hewlett Packard Enterprise has created a committee aimed at identifying "opportunities for additional value creation," the server maker said Wednesday.

headline: HPE Reaches Truce With Activist Elliott. Strategy Committee to Assess Direction.
summary: The company appoints longtime tech executive Robert M. Calderoni to the board as part of its agreement with activist investor Elliott.

raw.headline: HPE Reaches Truce With Activist Elliott. Strategy Committee to Assess Direction.
raw.summary: The company appoints longtime tech executive Robert M. Calderoni to the board as part of its agreement with activist investor Elliott.

headline: Hewlett Packard signs cooperation deal with Elliott, adds tech veteran to board
summary: As part of the agreement, the company's board has named KLA Corp Chairman Robert Calderoni as director.  Elliott had built a stake of more than $1.5 billion in Hewlett Packard Enterprise, a person familiar with the matter had said in April.

raw.headline: Hewlett Packard signs cooperation deal with Elliott, adds tech veteran to board
raw.summary: As part of the agreement, the company's board has named KLA Corp Chairman Robert Calderoni as director.  Elliott had built a stake of more than $1.5 billion in Hewlett Packard Enterprise, a person familiar with the matter had said in April.

headline: Hewlett Packard Enterprise Announces Board Enhancements to Support Ongoing Transformation and Drive Shareholder Value
summary: HOUSTON, July 16, 2025--HPE (NYSE: HPE) today announced several enhancements to support HPE’s ongoing transformation, including the formation of a new Strategy Committee of the Board and the appointment of Robert (Bob) Calderoni, a veteran technology executive and current Chairman of KLA Corp., as a director effective July 16, 2025. These enhancements were made as part of the Board’s continued efforts to drive shareholder value, and in connection with a cooperation agreement with Elliott Investm
